## IRouteRecord interface

路由历史记录

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface IRouteRecord 
```

## Remarks

可以通过 [IRouter.findRecordByKey()](./vue-taro.irouter.findrecordbykey.md)<!-- -->、[IRouter.findRecordByStep()](./vue-taro.irouter.findrecordbystep.md) 获得

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [key](./vue-taro.irouterecord.key.md) | string | 每条路由记录都有一个唯一的key |
|  [location](./vue-taro.irouterecord.location.md) | [Location](./vue-taro.location.md) | 路由描述 |
